name: appbuilder
description: (AppBuilder) A multi-tenant aware service to process our AppBuilder requests.
author: Johnny Hausman

scripts.lint: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo 'âœ”  Your .js files look good.'
scripts.devBuild:win32: docker run -it --mount type=bind,source=%cd%,target=/app -w /app node /bin/bash -c "npm i --force && cd AppBuilder && npm i --force"
scripts.devBuild:darwin:linux: docker run -it --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)",target=/app -w /app node /bin/bash -c "npm i --force && cd AppBuilder && npm i --force"
